description: AA-LEN. Flash loans for oswap protocol.

field_descriptions.interest: Command to accrue interest day 1 of each month. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.withdraw: Command to withdraw funds/withdraw interest. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.deposit: Command to deposit funds. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.asset: ID of asset (44 characters or base).
field_descriptions.addresses: oswap pool addresses array to send funds, min 2 max 4
field_descriptions.to: Optional, address to send instead of trigger address
field_descriptions.amount: Optional, amount to send to first pool. Default send all available.
